page.title: 15Waste Disposal Tip Rufforth.
page.content:
The proposed {Tip }is going to cover 125 acres and be 15 metres high.It will be placed at {Harewood Whin}which is half a mile from Rufforth.The {Tip} is going to be just past the bounds of a deserted {R.A.F }camp.It is to be sited on uncultivated waste land round which is a belt of trees.There are old {R.A.F}roads up to it.The people of Rufforth say it's going to attract gulls and rats.
A group of concerned villagers put up a fight to prevent the {Tip }in Rufforth. They call themselves{R.A.T.S which stands for{Rufforth Against Tip {Secrecy.
Villagers have demanded a{Public {Inquiry,}the result of which will be declared on the 12th of July 1985.
